metadata.description: What do you do when it's your destiny to be damned? For centuries, that is the question that has plagued each wielder of the Ebony Blade...with all of them eventually meeting untimely ends due to the sword's curse. And it is the question the current Black Knight, Dane Whitman, must ask himself as his addiction to the blade grows ever stronger and he finds himself in the aptly named Weirdworld.
metadata.name: Black Knight
